Ilu 1 bụ isi nke mbụ nke Akwụkwọ Ilu na Bible Hibru ma ọ bụ Agba Ochie nke Bible Ndị Kraịst

Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nchịkọta nke ọtụtụ nchịkọta akwụkwọ amamihe, nke nwere isi na 1:1 nwere ike ịbụ iji were Solomọn dị ka onye edemede ọdịnala nke akwụkwọ ahụ dum, mana ụbọchị nke nchịkọta ọ bụla siri ike ikpebi, ma eleghị anya akwụkwọ ahụ nwetara ọdịdị ikpeazụ ya n'oge a chụgara ya
Isiokwu a bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta mbụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ.
E dere ihe odide mbụ ahụ n'asụsụ Hibru
E kewara isiakwụkwọ a n'amaokwu 33.
Ụfọdụ ihe odide ndị mbụ nwere ederede nke isi a na Hibru bụ nke Masoretic Text, nke gụnyere Aleppo Codex (narị afọ nke iri), na Codex Leningradensis (1008)
A chọtara akụkụ nke isi a n'asụsụ Hibru n'etiti Akwụkwọ Mpịakọta Oké Osimiri Nwụrụ Anwụ gụnyere 4Q102 (4QProva; 30 BCE - 30 CE) na amaokwu 27-33 dị ugbu a

E nwekwara nsụgharị n'asụsụ Koine Greek nke a maara dị ka Septuagint, nke e mere na narị afọ ole na ole gara aga BC; ụfọdụ ihe odide oge ochie nke nsụgharị a gụnyere Codex Vaticanus (B; B; narị afọ nke anọ), Codex Sinaiticus (S; BHK: S; narị afọnke anọ), na Codex Alexandrinus (A; A; narị afọ嘅 ise)
Isiokwu a na-emeghe ngalaba a na-ewere dị ka nchịkọta mbụ n'akwụkwọ Ilu (nke gụnyere Ilu 1-9), nke a maara dị ka "okwu nkuzi"

Jerusalem Bible na-akọwa isi 1-9 dị ka mmalite nke isi 10-22:16, ihe a na-akpọ "[ezi] ilu nke Solomọn", dị ka "ahụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ". 
Isiokwu ahụ nwere usoro ndị a:
Akụkụ a na-enye ebumnuche na uru nke akwụkwọ ahụ dum, ọkachasị ntọala nke nkuzi ya
A na-edepụta akụkụ ise nke nchịkọta ilu n'ozuzu ya n'amaokwu 1:2a, 2b, 3a, 4a, 6a nke ngalaba mmeghe.
Akụkụ a nwere nke mbụ n'ime ọtụtụ ntụziaka site n'aka "nna nye nwa ya nwoke" n'ime akwụkwọ Ilu
Njirimara nke ntụziaka ndị a bụ:
N'adịghị ka omume a na-emekarị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ amamihe nke Ijipt na Babilọn, nke nwere ọnọdụ ntụziaka yiri nke onye nkuzi na ụmụ akwụkwọ, ọdịiche dị n'etiti nna na nne (cf
amaokwu 8) na-egosi na ntụziaka dị n'akwụkwọ Ilu nwere ike ịnwe ọnọdụ ntụziụ ndị nne na nna n'ụlọ
Ọ bụ ezie na ha na-echetara mgbe niile ikike nne na nna, okwu mkpali na-arịọkarị maka ezi uche mmadụ karịa ọrụ irube isi na nne na nna

Nwam nuru ihe  nna gi na agwa gi 
Ma dobe iwu nne gi nyere gi
Ụdị mkpesa a, nwa m nwoke, "na-ekwughachi mgbe niile n'isiakwụkwọ mmalite ndị a"

Onye rabaị French nke oge ochie Rashi tụrụ aro na "nna" na-ezo aka na Chineke, nna nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ, na "ntụziaka" ma ọ bụ "ịdọ aka ná ntị" pụtara iwu nke Chineke "nyere Mozis n'akwụkwọ na n'ọnụ"
N'otu aka ahụ, ọ tụrụ aro na "nne" na-ezo aka na "mba gị, mba Israel". Ọkà mmụta okpukpe John Gill na-agbagha nke a:
N'ime akụkụ a, a na-egosipụta Amamihe dị ka nwanyị, onye na-ekwu okwu na ikike nke Chineke (a kọwara ntọala nke ikike a n'Iwu 8:22-31)
Ịjụ Amamihe ga-apụta ịjụ "egwu nke Onyenwe anyị" (amaokwu 29), a na-ejikwa asụsụ yiri ebubo amụma (cf
Aịsaịa 65:1-2,12; Jeremaịa 6:19). N'aka nke ọzọ, ndị na-ege ntị n'Amamihe ga-enwe nchebe na udo nke uche nke ndị na-egere Amamihe ntị (amaokwu 33; cf

Ngozi
Ikpe chineke
Ndu nke chineke
Uwa
Ihe ojoo
eligwe
Ogologo ndu
Ibatara  mmadu ebere
Udo
Ezi omume
Amamihe
Àtụ:Book of Proverbs
